verses.verse: Paul <WG3972>, an apostle <WG652> of Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> by <WG1223> the will <WG2307> of God <WG2316>, to the saints <WG40> which are <WG5607> at <WG1722> Ephesus <WG2181>, and <WG2532> to the faithful <WG4103> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424>:
Grace <WG5485> be to you <WG5213>, and <WG2532> peace <WG1515>, from <WG575> God <WG2316> our <WG2257> Father <WG3962>, and <WG2532> from the Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>.

Blessed <WG2128> be the God <WG2316> and <WG2532> Father <WG3962> of our <WG2257> Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>, who <WG3588> hath blessed <WG2127> us <WG2248> with <WG1722> all <WG3956> spiritual <WG4152> blessings <WG2129> in <WG1722> heavenly <WG2032> places in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547>: places: or, things

According as <WG2531> he hath chosen <WG1586> us <WG2248> in <WG1722> him <WG846> before <WG4253> the foundation <WG2602> of the world <WG2889>, that we <WG2248> should be <WG1511> holy <WG40> and <WG2532> without blame <WG299> before <WG2714> him <WG846> in <WG1722> love <WG26>:

Having predestinated <WG4309> us <WG2248> unto <WG1519> the adoption of children <WG5206> by <WG1223> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> to <WG1519> himself <WG846>, according <WG2596> to the good pleasure <WG2107> of his <WG846> will <WG2307>,
To <WG1519> the praise <WG1868> of the glory <WG1391> of his <WG846> grace <WG5485>, wherein <WG1722> <WG3739> he hath made <WG5487> us <WG2248> accepted <WG5487> in <WG1722> the beloved <WG25>.

In <WG1722> whom <WG3739> we have <WG2192> redemption <WG629> through <WG1223> his <WG846> blood <WG129>, the forgiveness <WG859> of sins <WG3900>, according <WG2596> to the riches <WG4149> of his <WG846> grace <WG5485>;
Wherein <WG3739> he hath abounded <WG4052> toward <WG1519> us <WG2248> in <WG1722> all <WG3956> wisdom <WG4678> and <WG2532> prudence <WG5428>;

Having made known <WG1107> unto us <WG2254> the mystery <WG3466> of his <WG846> will <WG2307>, according to <WG2596> his <WG846> good pleasure <WG2107> which <WG3739> he hath purposed <WG4388> in <WG1722> himself <WG846>:

That in <WG1519> the dispensation <WG3622> of the fulness <WG4138> of times <WG2540> he might gather together in one <WG346> all things <WG3956> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547>, both <WG5037> which <WG3588> are in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772>, and <WG2532> which <WG3588> are on <WG1909> earth <WG1093>; even in <WG1722> him <WG846>: heaven: Gr. the heavens

In <WG1722> whom <WG3739> also <WG2532> we have obtained an inheritance <WG2820>, being predestinated <WG4309> according to <WG2596> the purpose <WG4286> of him who worketh <WG1754> all things <WG3956> after <WG2596> the counsel <WG1012> of his own <WG846> will <WG2307>:
That <WG1519> we <WG2248> should be <WG1511> to <WG1519> the praise <WG1868> of his <WG846> glory <WG1391>, who <WG3588> first trusted <WG4276> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547>. trusted: or, hoped

In <WG1722> whom <WG3739> ye <WG5210> also <WG2532> trusted, after that ye heard <WG191> the word <WG3056> of truth <WG225>, the gospel <WG2098> of your <WG5216> salvation <WG4991>: in <WG1722> whom <WG3739> also <WG2532> after that ye believed <WG4100>, ye were sealed with <WG4972> that holy <WG40> Spirit <WG4151> of promise <WG1860>,

Which <WG3739> is <WG2076> the earnest <WG728> of our <WG2257> inheritance <WG2817> until <WG1519> the redemption <WG629> of the purchased possession <WG4047>, unto <WG1519> the praise <WG1868> of his <WG846> glory <WG1391>.

Wherefore <WG1223> <WG5124> I also <WG2504>, after I heard <WG191> of <WG2596> your <WG5209> faith <WG4102> in <WG1722> the Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424>, and <WG2532> love <WG26> unto <WG1519> all <WG3956> the saints <WG40>,
Cease <WG3973> not <WG3756> to give thanks <WG2168> for <WG5228> you <WG5216>, making <WG4160> mention <WG3417> of you <WG5216> in <WG1909> my <WG3450> prayers <WG4335>;

That <WG2443> the God <WG2316> of our <WG2257> Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>, the Father <WG3962> of glory <WG1391>, may give <WG1325> unto you <WG5213> the spirit <WG4151> of wisdom <WG4678> and <WG2532> revelation <WG602> in <WG1722> the knowledge <WG1922> of him <WG846>: in: or, for the acknowledgement

The eyes <WG3788> of your <WG5216> understanding <WG1271> being enlightened <WG5461>; that <WG1519> ye <WG5209> may know <WG1492> what <WG5101> is <WG2076> the hope <WG1680> of his <WG846> calling <WG2821>, and <WG2532> what <WG5101> the riches <WG4149> of the glory <WG1391> of his <WG846> inheritance <WG2817> in <WG1722> the saints <WG40>,

And <WG2532> what <WG5101> is the exceeding <WG5235> greatness <WG3174> of his <WG846> power <WG1411> to <WG1519> us-ward <WG2248> who <WG3588> believe <WG4100>, according to <WG2596> the working <WG1753> of his <WG846> mighty <WG2479> power <WG2904>, his mighty power: Gr. the might of his power

Which <WG3739> he wrought <WG1754> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547>, when he raised <WG1453> him <WG846> from <WG1537> the dead <WG3498>, and <WG2532> set <WG2523> him at <WG1722> his own <WG846> right hand <WG1188> in <WG1722> the heavenly <WG2032> places,

Far above <WG5231> all <WG3956> principality <WG746>, and <WG2532> power <WG1849>, and <WG2532> might <WG1411>, and <WG2532> dominion <WG2963>, and <WG2532> every <WG3956> name <WG3686> that is named <WG3687>, not <WG3756> only <WG3440> in <WG1722> this <WG5129> world <WG165>, but <WG235> also <WG2532> in <WG1722> that which is to come <WG3195>:

And <WG2532> hath put <WG5293> all <WG3956> things under <WG5259> his <WG846> feet <WG4228>, and <WG2532> gave <WG1325> him <WG846> to be the head <WG2776> over <WG5228> all <WG3956> things to the church <WG1577>,
Which <WG3748> is <WG2076> his <WG846> body <WG4983>, the fulness <WG4138> of him that filleth <WG4137> all <WG3956> in <WG1722> all <WG3956>.
